resources.string: India Became free at 1947 and the constitution applied at 1950
The Supreme law of the land is the Constitution.
The (I.N.) Constitution was applied on 30 January.
The two rights in the Declaration of Independence are:\n \t Life\n \t persuit of happiness
Freedom of religion means: \n \t You can practice any religion, or not practice a religion.
Journalists is one branch or part of the government.
Congress does not make federal laws.
There are one hundred (100) U.S. Senators.
Naresndra modi is the prime minister of india
Is NRC a fine rule in india
Khesari lal is the best actor in bhojpuri
